resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105157</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105157</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202714</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Focus in Writing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fokus im Schreiben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Foyer dans l'écriture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Foco na escrita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fuoco nella scrittura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εστίαση που γράφει εγγράφως</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Foco en la escritura</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This brief lesson will help students recognize when a paragraph loses focus and will help them understand the concept of focus.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser kurze Lektionwille helfen Kursteilnehmern, 
zu erkennen, wann ein Paragraph Fokus verliert und ihnen helfen wird, 
das Konzept des Fokus zu verstehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette brève volonté de leçon aident des 
étudiants à identifier quand un paragraphe détruit le foyer et les 
aidera à comprendre le concept du foyer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta vontade breve da lição ajuda a estudantes 
reconhecer quando um parágrafo perde o foco e lhes ajudará 
compreender o conceito do foco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa breve volontà di lezione aiuta gli allievi
a riconoscere quando un paragrafo perde il fuoco e li aiuterà a 
capire il concetto del fuoco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το συνοπτικό μάθημα θα βοηθήσει τους σπουδαστές 
να αναγνωρίσουν πότε μια παράγραφος χάνει την εστίαση και θα τους
βοηθήσει να καταλάβουν την έννοια της εστίασης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta voluntad abreviada de la lección ayuda a 
estudiantes a reconocer cuando un párrafo pierde el foco y les 
ayudará a entender el concepto del foco.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:PETER BOBBE
FN:PETER BOBBE
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105157</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

  </manifestation>
